contractObjectiveList.description: The ENEMYFACTION scum are trying to get from one place to another. Kill them.
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy and Extract to Safety

contractObjectiveList.description: Send a message by not only destroy the convoy, but eliminte their escorts as well.
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy Guards.

dialogueContent.words: What an ugly place this is. At any rate, this is the region my staff believes the convoy will be traveling through.
Move to where you can observe its route, and see what we're actually dealing with.
Once the vehicles are all destroyed, I'll instruct a Leopard we have on station to pick you up.
This should be simple. Let's finish this quickly.
Your performance was acceptable, Commander, but it seems my information was incomplete. Frankly, I'm not surprised by that.
Our ground teams report that none of the vehicles were occupied; they were all remotely piloted—in other words, decoys. How aggravating.
I'll speak to my ISF liaison and see what they believe Nephrite will do next. Expect to deploy again immediately, Commander. I don't want to give him a chance to go to ground.
Did… did you just completely fail to accomplish anything at all, Commander? I lack the words to express my disappointment.
We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.
That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
Well done, Commander. You've successfully destroyed all the targets we didn't need killed. Can we wrap this up, please?
If those vehicles escape, Commander, I'm going to be very disappointed. I sincerely hope you catch them in time.
One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

longDescription: I refuse to believe it's going to be that easy, Commander. Keep your eyes peeled; this seems too simple.

objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the convoy units.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Davion Convoy

objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy Guards

objectiveList.description: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.
objectiveList.title: Prevent the Convoy from Arriving at Its Destination

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.
objectiveList.title: Recon the Convoy's Route

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone

objectiveList.description: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Davion Reinforcement Units

shortDescription: The ISF believes that Nephrite has already made planetfall and is tracking a FedSuns convoy moving out from the landing site. It's probable that the target is in the convoy; if we strike now, we should be able to end this little insurrection before it even begins. Engage the vehicles and destroy them all. Then, our people will sort through the remains and see if we hit our target. If we're lucky, we'll be done with this in time for dinner.
